question: List orders with amount greater than 200
Get product names where stock is less than 10
expected_sql: SELECT name FROM products WHERE stock < 10;

question: Show all customers created after 2024-01-01
expected_sql: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE date(created_at) > date('2024-01-01');

question: Count total orders
expected_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders;

question: Total amount per customer (id and sum)
expected_sql: SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
